items.item_text: Public hearing on proposed budget for fiscal year 2005/2006. A copy of the proposed budget is available for inspection at Education Center, 830 N. Capitol, Business Office during regular business hours. Hold Public Hearing on the adoption of the 2005-2006 budget as required by Education Code Section 42103
